pros: Very helpful team and leaders.
cons: No cons so far, it has been a really good experience.

job_title: Lab Medical Assistant II in Tampa, FL
pros: The Staff hold each other accountable on performing proper job duties. This means doing the right thing in all situations even it it means having to do more work.
cons: The cafeteria is pretty small and food is okay

review_title: A great company to work with
job_title: Did Not Specify in Tampa, FL
pros: Amazing family like culture. Great benefits and support programs for team members. There is frequent recognition from all levels of the organization. Adventhealth really puts an emphasis on taking care of their team and patients. The other hospital systems in the area pale by comparision.
cons: The only Con is that the traffic is busy in the area during rush hour.

pros: There are various schedule options.
cons: Phlebotomists are required to be lab assistants as well.

review_title: Care, that extends from patients to eachother.
job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Largo, FL
pros: This is by far the best place to work. Face it, we are here 50% of the time, and this here, is family. The vibe, the goal, in fact the standards of care are for patients and EACHOTHER. It really is the Healing Ministry of Christ, and the fact that we can express our spiritual beliefs is refreshing, needed and an personally so grateful. Not only do I work here, but I was a patient here, very sick and cared for so well. My family flew in during that time... and they still talk about the exceptional care I received. I am #Carrollwood4Life.
cons: There's always cons, there will always be some people you cannot make happy, that's everywhere. I say, The grass is greener where you water it......and I migrate to the colorful flowers...LOL.

pros: I have been with AdventHealth Carrollwood for many year and I call this place home. I have grown here, felt supported, valued and heard. It is a great place with many opportunities. Family oriented; as I walk through the hallways people know each other and greet you. I feel very connected and safe.
cons: I have to say it is hard to find a "downfall" but if I had to I would say I wish we were larger so that we could chare more of our greatness. I have met people that come to Carrollwood specifically because they wouldn't get this type of trusted care anywhere else!

pros: The employees are great! Day one benefits are okay, but they are subpar.
cons: They bring in incompetent management to run the lab and it really shows. Turnover is crazy! Not a single person supports you, Carrollwood is all politics.

job_title: Registered Nurse, Emergency Room in Brooksville, FL
pros: Sign on bonuses, most of the time plenty of overtime, huge company within many states.
cons: Consistently have a lot of travel nurses that make a lot more money than staff nurses. Very cooperate unorganized style management. Many holds due to hospital not being big enough for emergency room, patient flow, and surgical aspect. Use RQI for AHA CRP certifications.

pros: Because everybody works as a team and respects everybody.
cons: I have no comment about that

pros: Truly a caring and compassionate culture.
cons: Recovering from turn over - some staff left for outpatient clinics. Also, the burn-out, etc. related to pandemic that all healthcare is experiencing. Leadership is striving to support staff with positive culture and helping staff feel valued.

pros: Positive work environment, management listens & is accessible to employees, free meals
cons: Cost of monthly health insurance

pros: I have no pros as, yet.
cons: The coworker are great people that want to put patients first.

pros: It’s a smaller hospital with 103 beds
cons: The pandemic has the hospital running at full capacity

job_title: Sterile Processing Technician in Carrollwood, FL
pros: SOME fellow coworkers, great emphasis on some.
cons: Pay, Management, Human Resources in that order.

pros: Many pay increases. At least 2 per year
cons: The pay increases are small. 1% here 1.5% there

job_title: Emergency Department RN in Tampa, FL
pros: great culture, family environment, teamwork, positive growth
cons: the only con is that the hospital needs more physical space to accommodate patients

job_title: Medical Technologist II in Carrollwood, FL
pros: Good pay compared to area clinical laboratories. Florida Hospital is a good organization to work for. Good benefits, wonderful patient care and community involvement.
cons:
Poor management of the lab. Scratch that...horrible management. The worst I've ever had to deal with and I've been working in clinical labs for over 10 years. Because of this Carrollwood lab is chronically  understaffed.
Went from bad to worse with management. After new management took over early last year 8 employees left. I heard 2 more are in the process of leaving. This is a huge percentage of the lab staff.
Didn't realize just how unhappy I was there until I found my current position. I was willing to take a small pay cut just to get out of there.

review_title: Excellent culture with a family feel---great place to work!
job_title: Human Resources Director in Tampa, FL
pros: AdventHealth Carrollwood truly treats everyone like they are family! From the smiling faces when you walk in the door to those taking care of our patients and their families. Everyone you pass says hello to you and is very helpful! The CEO and her executive team are doing a wonderful job extending our mission to the communities we serve! Everyone truly makes you "feel whole" and part of the family...we are there for each other and our community!
cons: I have nothing negative to say!

review_title: A Joy to Work at! A true Mission-centric, World-Class Organization!
job_title: Executive Director of Operation in Tampa, FL
pros: Working at AdventHealth Carrollwood has allowed me to do meaningful things every day. Carrollwood is a high functioning and professional team that holds itself to high standards but has a warm friendly culture among leaders and associates. People here truly care about what they do every day and treat each other with respect.
cons: AdventHealth Carrollwood has some opportunities for further understanding of duties and responsibilities between Departments. However, the communication between them is mostly very positive.

review_title: Best Kept Secret Hospital in the Tampa Bay Area
pros: Where do I Start? This hospital is an awesome place to work. I suggest that you should believe in the saying “Don’t judge a book by its cover” even though this hospital has been in the Carrollwood area for decades, it’s the people/ staff is what makes this facility a 5 Star rated Healthcare provider. Check this hospital and we’ll take care of you.:)
cons: Nothing. Nada. Zilch. Well... ongoing constructions, but it’s all good. We’re growing.

pros: Transparent and ethical from a organization wide standpoint. Solid policy, pay and benefits.  From a Carrollwood specific standpoint; not just a workplace but a second family.....that really cares, and backs up the mission with actions....and just like family - not perfect.... but genuine and just.
cons:
None. 
Those with negative reviews have likely never been in a truly negative environment for comparison.

pros: The mission and the culture are the biggest reasons why I was attracted to Florida Hospital. I would say those are the 2 biggest pros for FH Carrollwood. Great place if your looking for a strong purpose in your career.
cons: Don't really have any cons.

pros: Passion for the whole patient, including mental health and spiritual needs. Opportunities to move around to new roles. Good experience. Competitive pay.
cons: Chronic understaffing, patient ratios based on budget and not on acuity or safety. Many employees working overtime

pros: Can't think of any. Oh, something came to mind. BBQ once a year
cons: . Most of the co-workers spread gossip. Back stabbing if they don't like you. Too many clicks. Park behind hospital scary at night because of the bad neighborhood. Cars were always getting broke into (Carrollwood).

job_title: Case Management Clinical Coordinator in Seminole, FL
pros: Family oriented and high values
cons: Pay is less than their competitors

pros: The employees are happy, helpful, understanding,compassion
